Hi, I'm Caio!

Programmer, Amateur UI Designer and Bilingual.

About Me:

I'm a 15 year old Brazilian Programmer and I like playing and making games. I have been programming ever since the age of 10, using Codecademy, where I learnt my first language, C#, following suit by JavaScript and Lua. Today, I know about 6 programming languages fluently.
I am part of two Roblox groups:
DevNet Studios

Position: Creator, Lead Developer

DevNet Studios is a Studio I created to seek my own personal projects. Unfortunately, our only game is currently on hold, due to my lack of level design skills.
I hope to continue DevNet Studios in a near future, as I create more connections and find more talent
